a: ✔ atomic: I like to eat apples and bananas
     Your code:
       lyric <- "I like to eat apples and bananas"
     Expected:
       lyric <- "I like to eat apples and bananas"
b: ✔ atomic: I like to eat
     Your code:
       intro <- substr(lyric, 1, 13)
     Expected:
       intro <- substr(lyric, 1, 13)
c: ✔ atomic: apples and bananas
     Your code:
       fruits <- substr(lyric, 15, len)
     Expected:
       fruits <- substr(lyric, 15, nchar(lyric))
d: ✔ atomic: eepples eend beeneenees
     Your code:
       fruits_e <- gsub("a", "ee", fruits)
     Expected:
       fruits_e <- gsub("a", "ee", fruits)
e: ✔ atomic: opples ond bononos
     Your code:
       fruits_o <- gsub("a", "o", fruits)
     Expected:
       fruits_o <- gsub("a", "o", fruits)
f: ✔ atomic: I like to eat eepples eend beeneenees
     Your code:
       lyric_e <- paste(intro, fruits_e)
     Expected:
       lyric_e <- paste(intro, fruits_e)
